bibl.title: Thoughts on Aeschylus: The Satyr Play Proteus - The Ending of the Oresteia.
bibl.note: Suggests that Aeschylus makes Proteus include in his story the truth about Iphigeneia's sacrifice, i.e. the story given in the Catalogue of Women (Hesiod Fr. 23(a) M.-W.), and the substance of Stesichorus' famous palinode (P.M.G. Fr. 16).
bibl.seg: CUNNINGHAM Margaret, Thoughts on Aeschylus: The Satyr Play Proteus - The Ending of the Oresteia.
